message.body: If u went to work how did u make out on the roads.
Highway is fine. Small streets in Baltimore are still all sorts of icy fucked up. I spent a good portion of the morning cleaning up my car and digging out the snow piled up next to it.
You get to stay at home today?
Welcome to Baltimore in winter. Were side streets generally don't get plowed at all.
It is supposed to snow again tonight and tomorrow
Feb is usually our snowiest month out of winter but shit we been active all winter.
At home. I have a massive headache. How'd your day go?
Oh poor baby. I know how those things go. Do u have stuff to take? My day was okay. Laid in bed most of the day.
I usually don't take anything.I'll be fine after I sleep. At least it looks like it's not snowing anymore.
It will snow tomorrow. And get some sleep my man.
